title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6028.2 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6028.2 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the minimum
qualifications for approval as a security guard training school and to
establish clear and specific requirements for such approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6028.2

Adopted, New

York State Register February 5, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 5, eff. 2/5/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
